task.title: Adding an API operation rate limit
task.shortdesc: How to add an operation rate limit to override the rate limit scheme for an API operation.

context.p: By default, the rate limit schemes that you configure for a plan is enforced on all APIs that are packaged in the plan. To override the rate limit schemes for an operation, define an API operation rate limit configuration.

step.cmd: From the search results, click API Operation Rate Limit.
Specify the API operation that you want to override rate limit for.
